title: Dean Puleo - All arrests of this man (ex-councilman and current nys 8th judicial district special counsel)

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: Dean Puleo - All arrests of this man (ex-councilman and current nys 8th judicial district special counsel)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

1.) A copy of all police reports, complaints and narratives regarding Dean Puleo, Date of Birth: 09/21/1959, between the following timeframe, 01/01/2000 through 08/25/2025. I have attached a copy of one news article highlighting one of Dean Puleo's arrests to help assist. Thank you.

https://buffalonews.com/news/elma-councilman-pleads-innocent-in-attack-on-his-ex-girlfriend/article_bc217769-47ab-5b9b-a7f6-345912d86459.html

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

The Riford Family
